1.title: MTN DEW Game Fuel 2011
1.plot: Despite what Phelous might tell you, this is a rare occurance for me. This time, I take a look at my favorite Mountain Dew flavor "Game Fuel" now that it's made its return in October of 2011, including a live tasting of the new "Tropical Flavor". Now you'll understand why I was so screamingly upset during the first Mountain Dew video. Help me load up my shopping cart with Citrus-Cherry, and fund my limited time addiction!

1.title: Campaigning for the DEWmocracy
1.plot: A Mountain Dew Flavor Review Rather than do a "first taste" video on the new Dew flavors, I go a bit more in depth about what I like and don't like about a flavor. Sit back and watch me drink sugar soda and act like it's a big deal.

2.title: Castlevania Judgment
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Sword of the Berserk (Part 1)
3.plot: Chaos starts his epic journey into the little known Dreamcast Game "Sword of the Berserk".Learn a bit about the game and it's history before diving right in to the title.When Guts and his party encounter a young girl being attacked by bandits, the wheels are set in motion for tragedy, when they stumble across a town ravaged by a strange disease, and held in the grip of a terrible tyrant with a terrible name and even worse fashion sense.

4.title: Sword of the Berserk (Part 2)
4.plot: Part Two of the Epic Saga! Ladies and gentlemen, I regret to inform you that... shit just got real! With Casca kidnapped, and Puck still annoying, Guts searches for clues to her whereabouts, as well as heads to a nearby village to find the "Great Tree". Will he find his lost love, complete his quest, or at least get everyone to pronounce his name correctly? Watch and find out.

5.title: Sword of the Berserk (Part 3)
5.plot: The final chapter of the epic saga of "Sword of the Berserk: Guts' Rage"With the Mandragoran village destroyed, Balzac's troops on the move, the town in chaos and Casca in peril YET AGAIN, it's up to Guts to put a stop to the anarchy and rescue Casca before everything falls apart. Will he be able to infiltrate the castle, confront Balzac, or get past that god-awful root stage? See how it all ends, as well as Chaos' final thoughts on this game.

6.title: Limbo
6.plot: It's rare when I care this much about an Xbox Live Arcade title. Check out why I feel that Limbo is the best game of the "Summer of Arcade" titles.

7.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: The Game
7.plot: Chaos takes a break from being lazy to tell you a bit about this XBLA title. For once, it's a cheap movie licensed game that doesn't suck.

8.title: Paranormal State
8.plot: No, not Paranormal Activity... that was believable compared to the inexplicably popular show. This time, Chaos looks at the Season 3 episode "Possession: Return of Six" to point out what might be the dumbest thing to happen to "paranormal reality television" since well... paranormal reality television.

9.title: Hard Corps Uprising
9.plot: It's been a while, but Chaos finally finds a game he likes enough to review... that is if he can stop playing it long enough. This time he takes us on a tour of Hard Corps Uprising, the latest title in the Contra series whether you fanboys like it or not.
